title: My Lib Ng New Options Schema
description: Creates a new Angular workspace with my-lib specific configurations.

dryRun.description: Run schematic in dry-run mode (no files written to disk)

name.description: The name of the workspace and initial project. Convention: start with 'angular-' prefix.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the workspace? (Convention: start with 'angular-' prefix)

directory.description: The directory name to create the workspace in.

version.description: The version of the Angular CLI to use.

minimal.description: Create a workspace without any testing frameworks.

routing.description: Generate a routing module for the initial project.
routing.x-prompt: Would you like to add Angular routing?

docker.description: Create Dockerfile and dev.Dockerfile for the Angular app?
docker.x-prompt: Will this application need to be containerized? If so, this schematic can create the Dockerfile.
